CustomField.formula: HYPERLINK( 'https://outlook.office.com/calendar/action/compose?rru=addevent&path=/calendar/action/compose&startdt=' + Outlook_Event_Start_Date__c + '&enddt=' + Outlook_Event_End_Date__c + '&ctz=' + RIGHT(TEXT(EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__Time_Zone__c),LEN(TEXT(EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__Time_Zone__c)) - FIND(" ",TEXT(EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__Time_Zone__c)) ) + '&subject=' + EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__Display_Name__c + '&location=ECCHO Online' + '&body=' + EventApi__Attendee_Event__r.EventApi__Display_Name__c, 'Add To Outlook Calendar' )
CustomField.label: Add To Outlook Calendar
